item.description: "Play for a Cause! Save Some Paws!" ~~~ Friends of Attleboro Animal Shelter is hosting this trip to Foxwoods on Sunday, February 19th! $30 includes bus, food & gaming vouchers! ~~~ Bus departs at 8:00a from Tribora Plaza in North Attleboro and leaves Foxwoods at 3:30p! ~~~ For additional information, contact the Friends of Attleboro Animal Shelter Fundraising Committee at FAASPets@comcast.net. ~~~ You can also "friend" their facebook page at http://www.facebook.c....
item.name: Friends of Attleboro Animal Shelter's Foxwoods Event!
